titleStmt.title: Royal loves, or, The unhappy prince a novel / written in French by a person of quality ; now rendred into English.
titleStmt.author: La Roche-Guilhen, Mlle de (Anne), 1644-1707.

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes authorship to Anne de La Roche-Guihen.
